summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Real Estate Agent Scheduler MVP. All backend APIs working perfectly (15/15 tests passed). Frontend UI functional with successful navigation, CRUD operations, and route optimization features.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay occasionally blocks navigation clicks when dialog is open

design_issues.issue: Grey and Gold color scheme is properly implemented with gold accents visible

passed_tests: Dashboard loads with all 4 stat cards (appointments, open houses, private viewings, total clients)
Client CRUD - Successfully created, viewed, and searched clients
Client form validation - All fields (name, phone, email, address, phone type) working
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Clients, Appointments, Route Optimizer, House Notes)
Appointment creation dialog opens and form fields populate correctly
House Notes page accessible and note creation dialog functional
Route Optimizer page loads with priority settings and map visualization
Priority toggle and weight adjustment controls functional
Backend API endpoints - All 15 tests passed including CRUD operations
Search functionality in clients and notes pages
Color scheme compliance - Gold/yellow accents properly implemented
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI improvement needed: Fix modal overlay z-index issue that occasionally blocks navigation when appointment dialog is open. Consider adding explicit dialog close handling or adjusting overlay click behavior.
